fixes.name: Now()
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau now() to DAX NOW(). This is implemented as a measure because NOW() returns the current datetime contextually (not a row-level transformation) and should be evaluated at query/refresh time.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The expression uses a dynamic time function (NOW()) rather than row-level fields, so it should be created as a measure instead of a calculated column.
